name: Pinball. (itch)
description:
Note- after a significant amount of fuckery, I managed to get the UI scaling right...but only in fullscreen (the iFrame itself, not the browser) on a PC

HEADPHONES NOT RECCOMENDED (TRUST ME)

Controls - 
Right Flipper - /
Left Flipper - Z
Turbo Boost - Q
Launch Ball - Space Bar

Features -
- Game over with random message
- Randomised sound effects
- UI with padded zeroes and image-represented lives
- Turbo Boost
- Debug ball placement with mouse
- Ball trail
- Fully implemented bounce pads and bumpers

References -
Pixeboy font by Abas Creative
This is a Certified Hood Classic *EarRape* audio by Brendan Stanford
Gnome Sound Effect audio by Sislak11
Windows XP Error audio by Microsoft
Wilhelm Scream audio by Ben Burtt
